snippet: David Wise of Reno, Nev., posted the highest score in a competition that is the high-flying cousin to the better-known version on snowboards.
abstract: American freestyle skier David Wise wins gold in men's halfpipe competition at the Sochi Games, as Canadian Mike Riddle earns silver and Kevin Rolland of France takes bronze.
lead_paragraph: David Wise of Reno, Nev., posted the highest score in a competition that is the high-flying cousin to the better-known version on snowboards.

headline.main: In a World of Free Spirits, the Undude Is Best
headline.print_headline: In a World of Free Spirits, the Undude Is Best
